title: Dimensionality Reduction with Pipeline and GridSearchCV
description: This lab demonstrates the use of Pipeline and GridSearchCV in scikit-learn to optimize over different classes of estimators in a single CV run. We will be using a support vector classifier to predict hand-written digits from the popular MNIST dataset.

meta.title: Optimize Machine Learning Models with Pipeline and GridSearchCV
meta.description: Learn how to use Pipeline and GridSearchCV in scikit-learn to optimize support vector classifiers for hand-written digit recognition on the MNIST dataset.
meta.keywords: Machine Learning, Optimization, Pipeline, GridSearchCV, Support Vector Classifier, MNIST
